Updates contributor by walletAddress

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"walletAddress","required":true,"in":"path","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}

>
